org.ptolemy.optimization

Class ObjectiveFunctionForPhaseI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ptolemy.optimization.ObjectiveFunction
      • org.ptolemy.optimization.ObjectiveFunctionForPhaseI

  • class ObjectiveFunctionForPhaseI
extends ObjectiveFunction
    The objective function class which is used in Phase 1 of the interior point method. In the interior point method, a starting point X must be a feasible point that satisfies all constraints. To find the feasible point, the interior point method calculate Phase 1 using this class.
    Author:
    shuhei emoto

      • calcFunction

        public boolean calcFunction(double[] x)
        Description copied from class: ObjectiveFunction
        Objective function and constraint functions. In this function, all results(f0_result, fi_results) and gradients(f0_gradient, fi_gradients) must be updated.
        Specified by:
        calcFunction in class ObjectiveFunction
        Parameters:
        x - : input variables
        Returns:
        If calculation was terminated by user input, return "false".

      • checkPhaseICriteria

        public boolean checkPhaseICriteria()
        Check the termination criteria in phase I.
        Returns:
        true if all of constraints are negative and Phase I should finish.

      • setInitialValue

        public boolean setInitialValue(double tolerance)
        Set initial residual value s.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if initial value is already feasible.
